channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hydrogen cars, London pubs, and Manchester United: 71-year-old billionaire Sir Jim Ratcliffe is in a race to secure his legacy
item.description: Jim Ratcliffe's purchases may help him be remembered beyond his fortune from a $52 billion petrocchemicals giant.

item.title: Damaged Red Sea tanker poses environmental hazard as fires observed on board
item.description: "A potential spill could lead to disastrous consequences for the region's marine environment," the Djibouti Ports & Free Zones Authority said.

item.title: Inside Kamala Harris’s fight to take down a company scamming college students
The ‘Viking Code’ leadership of Nicolai Tangen, a $1.7T wealth fund CEO unafraid to lock horns with Elon Musk
item.description: The head of Norway's sovereign wealth fund demonstrates that individual drive and community spirit can build a powerful symbiosis for change.

item.title: Meta says it found WhatsApp accounts linked to Iranian hackers targeting Biden, Trump officials
item.description: Meta said it blocked a "small cluster" of WhatsApp accounts linked to an Iranian hacking group targeting U.S. officials.

item.title: Why Subway’s new $6.99 footlong deal may not win back customers
Meta blocked an Iranian hacking network posing as tech support from Microsoft and Google
item.description: Hackers tried to target the WhatsApp accounts of political staffers tied to Donald Trump and Joe Biden.

item.title: Intel has hired Morgan Stanley, other advisers for activist defense
item.description: With its stock down almost 60% this year, Intel is gearing up to defend itself against pressure from activist investors.

item.title: Fresh off $1.6 billion loss, Intel is bracing for activist investors: report
Apple to unveil new iPhones and big upgrades to wearables on Sept. 10
item.description: The unveiling will be followed by the phones going on sale Sept. 20, in line with Apple’s typical approach in recent years.

item.title: Bronfman's Paramount bid could keep Shari Redstone involved with the company
item.description: Edgar Bronfman Jr. is open to having Shari Redstone remain involved at Paramount if the special committee accepts his consortium's bid for a controlli...

item.title: This fund sees big rise for Apple’s stock after timely bet that it’s no AI loser
Here’s what to do before the Fed cuts rates—’you want to jump on that now’
item.description: “There is not a benefit to waiting because interest rates are going to be moving lower,” Bankrate's Greg McBride said.

item.title: RFK Jr. says in court filing that he's endorsing Trump, ending his presidential hopes
item.description: Kennedy had dropped in the polls in recent weeks. He did not announce an endorsement but is expected to back Trump, according to two people with knowl...

item.title: Can Nvidia’s stock hit a high after earnings? Options market says it’s unlikely.
